thread.title: Reliance Jio Vs Airtel free data plan: A comparison | Zee News
thread.title_full: Reliance Jio Vs Airtel free data plan: A comparison | Zee News

title: Reliance Jio Vs Airtel free data plan: A comparison | Zee News
text:
Ambani said all domestic calls to any network including STD and roaming will continue to be free. Here is a comparison between Airtel My Infinity plan and Reliance Jio Plan 
Reliance Jio Plan 
Jio, which marked Ambani's re-entry in telecom space after a decade with free voice calls for life and free data for a promotional period that was extended until March 31, will offer existing users unlimited services for a year at a monthly charge of Rs 303 and one-time membership fee of Rs 99. 
All domestic calls to any network including STD and roaming will continue to be free. 
Airtel My Infinity Plan 
However, If you do not have 4G handset, you will get 1 GB data on the Airtel pack First Published: Thursday, February 23, 2017 - 17:51 More from zeenews
